column1: The Trump administration is organizing a project called "Operation Warp Speed" to develop 100 million coronavirus vaccine doses by year’s end

The latest on the coronavirus: - Brazil overtakes France in deaths and now ranks fourth in the world for fatalities - The New York subway system will be prepared when the city reopens, Cuomo says - Global cases top 6 million
